channel.title: Slayer tower
channel.description:
Can sombody tell me how to add a chest in slayer tower that gives you xp when you search in it ??? I search on other forums and google but ... i dont find it .. so if you can give me a link to a good guide or something ....
Thanks

item.title: Slayer tower
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Add a global object. That shouldn’t be too difficult.
Under objectClick, add:
[i]case (objectID):
addSkillXP(amount, numberForSlayer);
break;

Read full topic
